title: Bronze 5 or over team :D (any bae is allowed)
body: Looking for a group of dedicated players (not super duper hardcore) ranging from bronze 5 and over. Me being Silver 5 idgaf bout yo rank. Aslong as you aint no rude Bish. Role ign whatever you feel is needed to try join :P

replies.body: i'd have a go at some team ranked im always chill relaxed no rage i take advice and can voice chat, can do whatever role is needed

Sure just keep your post here and when i get a group i will add all :3
Dont wanna forget anyone
hey im bronze 1 pretty chill i play every role other than support really but will if needed

Hmmm, I will join, but as reserve, I prefer solo queue but if you are ever 1 player short of starting a match I will play. Adc or Top, well anywhere other than supp, thats boring. And sure, I will be you bae ;)

IGN: Metalliiccaa
Rank: Bronze 5. If you are willing to ignore that haha
best 3 Roles in order: Jungle Support Top
Worst 2 in order: ADC Mid Need practice iv been doing to much Jungle 
I dont Go off my Head about anything nor am i an Asshole most people i play with Love to play with me 
I have Skype Ventrillo and TS3 as talking Opinions if needed
If you are interested in having me add me :)

ign: deathangel1 
role: support main 
active everyday
I'll join your team i main top lane doe

i'd have a go at some team ranked im always chill relaxed no rage i take advice and can voice chat, can do whatever role is needed
